subclusters.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
Telomerase-Mediated Telomere Stabilization and Apoptosis Resistance Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on genetic control, inheritance, and homeostasis of telomere length as a determinant of aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes chromosome-specific telomere length profiles and genetic/epigenetic control of telomere length.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere length establishment during development and its programming by prenatal environment.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links telomere attrition and genetic mutations (WRN) affecting telomere maintenance and replicative lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details telomere length as a replication timer regulated by telomerase and its role in senescence and cancer.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere structure, progressive shortening, and telomerase activity in cellular lifespan regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere attrition as molecular clock and telomerase role in cellular immortality and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains telomere shortening due to end replication problem and telomerase maintenance in germline cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details telomerase repression in somatic cells and telomere shortening as mitotic clock triggering senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows telomerase reconstitution extends replicative lifespan by elongating telomeres in somatic cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere shortening as cause of senescence and telomerase activity maintaining telomere length.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Mathematical modeling of telomere shortening due to end-replication problem and its role in cellular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Telomere shortening as mitotic clock driving cellular and organismal aging and stem cell dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Correlates telomere attrition rate with lifespan across species and telomerase role in telomere repair.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links growth conditions and oxidative stress to telomere erosion as a causal aging mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows testosterone accelerates telomere shortening linking reproductive investment to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length Homeostasis and Genetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere shortening in oocytes causing reproductive aging and apoptosis.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomerase-Mediated Telomere Stabilization and Apoptosis Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights telomerase activity maintaining telomere stability and conferring apoptosis resistance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomerase-Mediated Telomere Stabilization and Apoptosis Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere shortening inducing aging phenotypes and non-canonical TERT functions affecting apoptosis.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomerase-Mediated Telomere Stabilization and Apoptosis Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links cardiovascular aging factors accelerating telomere attrition and systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomerase-Mediated Telomere Stabilization and Apoptosis Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes ionizing radiation accelerating telomere shortening causing vascular dysfunction and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomerase-Mediated Telomere Stabilization and Apoptosis Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows telomere shortening triggers DNA damage and fibrosis, with telomerase silencing limiting regeneration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomerase-Mediated Telomere Stabilization and Apoptosis Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Two-hit model of telomere shortening in female germline causing reproductive aging and apoptosis.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomerase-Mediated Telomere Stabilization and Apoptosis Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Telomere shortening triggers DNA damage checkpoints inducing senescence as tumor suppressive mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomerase-Mediated Telomere Stabilization and Apoptosis Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Telomere dysfunction triggers DNA damage response leading to senescence or apoptosis preventing cancer.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-p53-PGC-1 Mitochondrial Dysfunction Unifying Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links telomere dysfunction to p53 activation and mitochondrial decline driving systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-p53-PGC-1 Mitochondrial Dysfunction Unifying Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes telomere damage in long-lived post-mitotic cells causes mitochondrial dysfunction and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-p53-PGC-1 Mitochondrial Dysfunction Unifying Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere shortening causing epigenetic and genetic instability beyond telomeres contributing to aging.
